Introduction

Dragon Pony is a four-member boy band under Antenna. They made their debut on September 26, 2024 with the EP "Pop Up".

The group name was chosen by the members themselves, and refer to the the members' Chinese zodiac signs, as they are all born in either the year of the dragon or the year of the horse.
